name: Morgan Stanley
text: As a Technology Summer Analyst, I successfully executed a project involving the conversion of XSD schemas to POJO classes and the creation of a generic REST Template library for calling any service using any HTTP method.

name: GDSC, NIT Silchar
text: I was one of the organizers in  the NITS Hacks 6.0 Hackathon  where I served as the anchor for both the opening and closing ceremonies.

name: GDSC, NIT Silchar
text: As a mentor, I was one of the speakers in CSS and React.js workshops at NIT Silchar, where I taught students key front-end development skills and best practices.

name: GDSC, NIT Silchar
text: In my role as a co-head developer, I played a pivotal role in overseeing the Oikyotaan website and ensuring the successful execution of the event's technical aspects.
